title: Rebirth of Poisoned Empress - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Aristocracy   Black Belly   Childcare   Cruel Characters   Doting Love Interests   Empires   Familial Love   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Medical Knowledge   Mpreg   Politics   Power Couple   Reincarnation   Revenge   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   S*xual Abuse   Smart Couple   Time Skip   Torture   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Twins   Wars
author: 颜若优雅
description: Shen Liang was beautiful and cold like jade, he was extremely cruel to his enemy. Pei Yuanxun who killed his whole family in his childhood was handsome and unruly, but he hold thousands Iron Guards in his hand. This was a story about two people, accidentally intertwined in their hunger for revenge. Shen Liang who was reborn again, he wouldn't held back, blood will be paid by blood. No one will have peaceful life until he drown all his enemy.>
